attributes.action: Change the law to make it illegal not to give voters the option of selecting None of the Above (NOTA) at any local or national election in the future.
attributes.additional_details: Many, many people currently in politics have demonstrated that they shouldn't be there.  Many of us would prefer to be unrepresented that to be represented by somebody who cannot be trusted and somebody who blatantly ignores the will of the people.  WE HAVE THE HUMAN RIGHT TO CHOOSE NOT TO ELECT ANY OF THE PEOPLE NAMED ON ANY BALLOT SHEET.
